reviews.content: Quality ramen and sushi!!! Delicious

Waited 30 min for undercooked sushi rice and fish served at above room temperature. Sent back our order and it came back again with the same flaws. We left the restaurant and won‚Äôt come back. Not acceptable for this price category.
One of the best Japanese restaurants in Hanoi
Great place!  Good service, not expensive, very quiet. ‚Ä¶
Private. Fit for work-dinner and business reception. Great location. Top quality fresh fishes.
Best in town
Edit: After the incident, the restaurant also called to apologize to me and my family many times. Because of the restaurant's goodwill, I have edited the review. ‚Ä¶

Hatoyama is not to mention the service level and food quality. If price is not an issue, you should come here to eat. I am a sushi and sashimi fan so I searched and tried many restaurants. But this is still the best. The food is very fresh ‚Ä¶

I think the food is okay but the service of the staff is really boring. At least when the first customer comes, they ask if they want to eat hot pot or something, introduce the restaurant, grill the price, hot pot price. The customer goes ‚Ä¶

Private room, beautiful, good service. Beautiful space. Suitable for receiving high-class guests. I used very fresh and delicious sashimi. The fish hotpot was also very delicious. Using JCB card got a 20% discount so the price is very valuable. I really like it.

Fresh. Tasty and comfortable place. Stayed in VIP1 room.

ok
Fresh seafood

I have long liked to eat here. Delicious food prepared to suit my taste. Cozy and luxurious VIP room suitable for receiving guests. Friendly and enthusiastic staff. Diverse seafood, reasonable prices. Easy to find central location, spacious parking lot.
Delicious food, attentive service, polite and courteous staff.

The food is very fresh and delicious, there is a tank of fresh seafood, which can be picked up and cooked by the staff; the staff is pretty, professional, and attentive. The space is very luxurious and worthy of its class!
